overview: While thinking of leaving for a peaceful vacation in Romania, her country of origin, Lucie is kidnapped by members of a local cartel. The reason? Her fiancé tried to divert drugs by hiding them in his underwear. Much smarter than they think, she forms friendships with her cell friends and takes advantage of the sexual affairs between the members of the gang to divert their attention... Will she succeed in escaping?
title: The Mule
